column2: "Ghk... You have achieved the pinnacle of Phantomhood, and yet you have not yet abandoned hope...?"
"...You really are resolved to hold onto it, aren't you? But that sense of justice will destroy you some day..."
"...No, I will say no more. I have given you my advice. The rest is up to you."
"I will continue to observe you. Whatever you aim to do with my Phantom, we shall see whether you are able to achieve it... Farewell."
